resources.title: Physics Formula Sheet
resources.description: Comprehensive formula sheet for NEET Physics covering all important equations and concepts including Mechanics, Thermodynamics, Waves, Electromagnetism, and Modern Physics.
resources.subject: Physics

resources.title: Organic Chemistry Notes
resources.description: Detailed notes on organic chemistry reactions and mechanisms for NEET preparation. Covers nomenclature, isomerism, reaction mechanisms, and important named reactions.
resources.subject: Chemistry

resources.title: Biology Mindmap
resources.description: Visual mindmap covering all important topics in NEET Biology for quick revision. Includes Plant Kingdom, Animal Kingdom, Human Physiology, Genetics, and Ecology.
resources.subject: Biology

resources.title: NEET 2022 Question Paper
resources.description: Previous year question paper with solutions for NEET 2022. Includes Physics, Chemistry, and Biology sections with detailed answer explanations.
resources.subject: All

resources.title: Physics Problem Solving Guide
resources.description: Step-by-step guide to solving complex physics problems for NEET. Covers problem-solving strategies, common pitfalls, and practice questions with solutions.
resources.subject: Physics

resources.title: Chemistry NCERT Summary
resources.description: Chapter-wise summary of NCERT Chemistry for quick revision. Covers Classes 11 and 12 Chemistry with important points and reactions highlighted.
resources.subject: Chemistry

resources.title: Biology Important Diagrams
resources.description: Collection of important diagrams for NEET Biology. Includes diagrams of cell organelles, human heart, nephron, neuron, and photosynthesis process.
resources.subject: Biology

resources.title: NEET Chemistry Question Bank
resources.description: Comprehensive question bank for NEET Chemistry with 500+ multiple choice questions covering Physical, Organic, and Inorganic Chemistry.
resources.subject: Chemistry

resources.title: Physics Laws and Principles
resources.description: Compilation of important physics laws and principles for NEET. Includes Newton's Laws, Thermodynamic Laws, Electromagnetic Laws, and Modern Physics Principles.
resources.subject: Physics

resources.title: Biology Classification Chart
resources.description: Detailed classification chart for NEET Biology covering Plant Kingdom, Animal Kingdom, and Microbes. Includes characteristics and examples for each group.
resources.subject: Biology

resources.title: NEET Physics Mock Test 1
resources.description: Full-length NEET Physics mock test with 50 questions and detailed solutions. Covers all major topics with varying difficulty levels.
resources.subject: Physics

resources.title: Chemistry Reaction Mechanisms
resources.description: Detailed explanation of important organic chemistry reaction mechanisms for NEET. Includes SN1, SN2, E1, E2, and aromatic substitution reactions.
resources.subject: Chemistry
